chunk:
VIKA’S ESSENTIALS RAW CREAM

Brand: Vika's Essentials

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Shea (Butyrospermun parkii) Butter*, Coconut (Cocos nucifera) Oil*, Sweet Almond (Prunus amygdalus dulcis) Oil*, Jojoba (Simmondsia chinensis) Oil*, Macadamia Nut (Macadamia integrifolia) Oil*, Rose Hip Seed (Rosa rubiginosa) Oil*, Avocado (P

sa) Oil*, Avocado (Persea americana) Oil*, Aloe Vera (Aloe barbadensis) Gel*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Vitamin C, Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis) Oil*, Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia) Oil*, * Certified Organic Ingredient

Directions: Apply very lightly (pea-size amount) on damp skin, after using Vika's Essentials Facial Floral Toner.

Warnings:

l Toner.

Warnings: Use sparingly:  a little goes a long way!  Store in a cool dry place, use within 6 months.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
